title: Setting Up Form Notifications
description: Configure email notifications, confirmations, and automated responses in Gravity Forms.

blocks.content: Learn how to set up automated responses and notifications to keep both administrators and users informed about form submissions.

Configure administrator notifications:

  • Setting up email recipients
  • Customizing notification content
  • Using conditional notifications
  • HTML email templates

Create user-friendly confirmations:

  • Text confirmations
  • Page redirects
  • Custom confirmation messages
  • Dynamic content in confirmations

author: admin
